lines.text: [first lines]
Hello Huckleberry.
How come you're playin' hooky?
Same as you.
Never spent a day in school in my life.
Oh Tom. So I'm not the first one you've been engaged to. Philanderer!
What?
Well that's what you are.
Yeah but what does it mean?
I'm not sure. But even if I did know I wouldn't tell you.
Well with those two it's hard to figure who's influencin' who. I think the time has come for some good old-fashioned UN-influencin'.
Heck, girls aint no fun. Always gigglin' or weepin'.
Whata you know about girls?
I was engaged to Amy Lawrence... always gigglin' or weepin'.
What's the matter, boy? Ya aint been yourself for days. Ya need some of the remedy?
I don't know why it is people eat so much more when they eat outdoors.
Hucky, whata ya reckon'll come of this?
If Doc Robinson dies I reckon hangin'll come of it.

[sings v.o]
If'n I was God/ well just for spite/ I wouldn't set the sun at night/ till everyone was treated right/ by everyone else they see.

[choking on pipe smoke]
If'n I had known how much fun smokin' was, I would have started long ago.

Well I give it two weeks and it just don't work. She makes me get up the same time every morning. She makes me wash. I gotta wear them fancy clothes that just smothers me. I can't smoke, I cant chaw. I gotta wear shoes all Sunday. I gotta ask to go swimmin', I gotta ask to go fishin'. Well I'll be damned if I don't have to ask to do everything. I tell ya, I had to sneak up to the attic and cuss for ten minutes just to get the taste back in my mouth.
